description: We see them everyday.  Ourselves, others, and inanimate objects appear in windows, mirrors, and even on water surfaces.  But what are they?  Do they provide glimpses into parallel worlds?  Samuel O'Toole thinks so.  And as he's joined by Brad Foxx, Samuel gazes into what he believes to be the eyes of his opposite self.  The same in every way, but moving with opposite momentum.From the world inside the mirror, opposite Sammy and Brad look into our world, the one in which Brad is getting a good taste of Samuel's cock.  It's a hard, fat boner, in many ways exactly like the one on mirror world Sammy.  When both O'Tooles decide to get their mouths around their respective Brad's firm dick, will you be witnessing two separate dimensions coming together for a passionate tryst?  Or is it just a simple reflection?  Either way, you'll see amazing angles in this intensely passionate encounter.  Watch him pound Brad's nice, tight asshole the way only Sammy can...and mirror world Sammy.  Enjoy!
title: Sexual Reflections
